?Sick?, ?Offensive?, ?Shocking? are just a matter of perspective. Some might call this a re-emergence of an ancient art form, a creative expression of latent desires, a ?real-time? enactment of the Predator-Prey equation ... There ain?t nothing here that wasn?t carried out kazillion times in the past; it?s still continuing disguised as religion, politics, avarice, as though such flimsy tunics of pseudo-justification bestow some respectability sufficient to sanctify and condone such practices. Just as stealing is unacceptable by universal standards of one?s own conscience (no matter how convincing the reason sounds), so is stealing another?s very existence for one?s own personal pleasure. I can think of numerous activities one could cram in the ?Sick, Offensive, Shocking? Category; Lord knows I packed quite a few in there myself! But this here would stand unchallenged, alone, all by its putrid self in the ?Evil-Vile? realm.  It?s a frightening peek into oneself that awakens a sober realization of the corruption and degeneracy lurking hidden in us all: a part of me that I wish would never surface. But then again, ?Life is but a stage and we must flay apart all their parts ? ? (Sorry, Elvis!) ?. Unless, of course, you happen NOT to be the ?flay-ER?, but the ?flay-EE?!
